Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. With its unique features and exceptional quality, it's truly a one-of-a-kind offering. Given its value and benefits, I'm extending this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $7500. This is an excellent chance to acquire a product that could potentially be worth much more in the future. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
